content: this pattern is designed to be made to your own measurements instead of relying on a gauge swatch you ll be measuring on your body as you work the pattern this allows you to use your own choice of yarn and coordinating hook your amount of yarn will vary with your own measurements i made two skirts to fit a size small waist and used approximately 520 yards of i love this cotton for one and approximately 597 yards of big twist living for the other the main ripple pattern of this skirt is in multiples of 8 stitches pattern is created in the round in one piece and is designed to be the same width from top to bottom and form fitting to your body
